hashCrc32.name: hashCrc32
hashCrc32.description: Returns a CRC32 hash for a given string expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The string expression that will be hashed.

hashCrc32.longDescription: Returns a CRC32 hash for a given string expression.

hashMd5.name: hashMd5
hashMd5.description: Computes the MD5 hash for a given string expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression from which the MD5 hash needs to be computed.

hashMd5.longDescription: Computes the MD5 hash for a given string expression.

hashSha1.name: hashSha1
hashSha1.description: Computes the SHA-1 hash for a given string expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression from which the SHA-1 hash needs to be computed.

hashSha1.longDescription: Computes the SHA-1 hash for a given string expression.

hashSha256.name: hashSha256
hashSha256.description: Returns a SHA-256 hash for the given expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The string expression that will be hashed.

hashSha256.longDescription: Returns a SHA-256 hash for the given expression.

hashSha512.name: hashSha512
hashSha512.description: Returns a SHA-512 hash for the given expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The string expression that will be hashed.

hashSha512.longDescription: Returns a SHA-512 hash for the given expression.

hashXxHash32.name: hashXxHash32
hashXxHash32.description: Returns a xxHash32 hash for a given string expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression that is considered for the hash function.

hashXxHash32.longDescription: Returns a xxHash32 hash for a given string expression.

hashXxHash64.name: hashXxHash64
hashXxHash64.description: Returns a xxHash64 hash for a given string expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression that is considered for the hash function.

hashXxHash64.longDescription: Returns a xxHash64 hash for a given string expression.
